sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { AreaChart, Area, LineChart, Line, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; import { Zap, Activity, Shield, AlertCircle, TrendingUp, Battery, Cpu, Users } from 'lucide-react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import ChartCard from '../components/ChartCard'; import MetricCard from '../components/MetricCard'; // Sample data for charts const availabilityData = [ { time: '00:00', availability: 85 }, { time: '04:00', availability: 78 }, { time: '08:00', availability: 92 }, { time: '12:00', availability: 88 }, { time: '16:00', availability: 95 }, { time: '20:00', availability: 89 }, { time: '24:00', availability: 91 }, ]; const energyData = [ { day: 'Mon', demand: 245 }, { day: 'Tue', demand: 312 }, { day: 'Wed', demand: 289 }, { day: 'Thu', demand: 356 }, { day: 'Fri', demand: 423 }, { day: 'Sat', demand: 198 }, { day: 'Sun', demand: 167 }, ]; const efficiencyData = [ { station: 'Alpha', efficiency: 94 }, { station: 'Beta', efficiency: 87 }, { station: 'Gamma', efficiency: 91 }, { station: 'Delta', efficiency: 89 }, ]; const anomalyData = [ { time: 'Week 1', score: 0.2 }, { time: 'Week 2', score: 0.1 }, { time: 'Week 3', score: 0.3 }, { time: 'Week 4', score: 0.15 }, ]; const COLORS = ['#0D7BFF', '#4CCBFF', '#0A1F44', '#90CAF9']; // Sample data for tables const chargePoints = [ { id: 'CP_111', vendor: 'DemoVendor', model: 'DemoModel', firmware: null, status: 'Disconnected', totalKwh: 0 }, { id: 'CP_112', vendor: 'DemoVendor', model: 'DemoModel', firmware: null, status: 'Disconnected', totalKwh: 0 }, { id: 'CP_123', vendor: 'DemoVendor', model: 'DemoModel', firmware: null, status: 'Disconnected', totalKwh: 0 }, { id: 'CP_321', vendor: 'DemoVendor', model: 'DemoModel', firmware: null, status: 'Disconnected', totalKwh: 0 }, ]; const connectors = { 'CP_111': [{ connectorId: 1, status: 'Available', errorCode: 'NoError', lastUpdate: '2025-10-27 10:15:31' }], 'CP_112': [{ connectorId: 1, status: 'Available', errorCode: 'NoError', lastUpdate: '2025-10-27 10:15:35' }], 'CP_123': [{ connectorId: 1, status: 'Available', errorCode: 'NoError', lastUpdate: '2025-10-27 09:59:21' }], 'CP_321': [{ connectorId: 1, status: 'Available', errorCode: 'NoError', lastUpdate: '2025-10-27 09:21:00' }], }; const transactions = [ { cpId: 'CP_111', id: 27, idTag: 'DEMO-123', connectorId: 1, meterStart: 0, meterStop: 1000, startTs: '2025-10-27 10:00:25', stopTs: '2025-10-27 10:00:35' }, { cpId: 'CP_111', id: 28, idTag: 'DEMO-123', connectorId: 1, meterStart: 0, meterStop: 1000, startTs: '2025-10-27 10:02:42', stopTs: '2025-10-27 10:02:52' }, { cpId: 'CP_111', id: 29, idTag: 'DEMO-123', connectorId: 1, meterStart: 0, meterStop: 1000, startTs: '2025-10-27 10:11:15', stopTs: '2025-10-27 10:11:25' }, { cpId: 'CP_111', id: 30, idTag: 'DEMO-123', connectorId: 1, meterStart: 0, meterStop: 1000, startTs: '2025-10-27 10:15:21', stopTs: '2025-10-27 10:15:31' }, { cpId: 'CP_112', id: 31, idTag: 'DEMO-123', connectorId: 1, meterStart: 0, meterStop: 1000, startTs: '2025-10-27 10:15:35', stopTs: '2025-10-27 10:15:40' }, ]; const Dashboard = () => { const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'Connected': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; case 'Disconnected': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; case 'Available': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; case 'Charging': return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100'; case 'Faulted': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; return (
{/* KPI Metrics */}
{/* AI/ML Insights Charts */}
{/* Charge Points Table */}

Charge Points

{chargePoints.map((cp) => ( ))}
ID Vendor Model Firmware Status Total kWh
{cp.id} {cp.vendor || "-"} {cp.model || "-"} {cp.firmware || "-"} {cp.status} {cp.totalKwh.toFixed(2)} kWh
{/* Connectors Tables */} {Object.entries(connectors).map(([cpId, cpConnectors]) => (

Connectors - {cpId}

{cpConnectors.map((conn) => ( ))}
Connector ID Status Error Code Last Heartbeat
{conn.connectorId} {conn.status} {conn.errorCode} {conn.lastUpdate || "-"}
))} {/* Transactions Table */}

Transactions

{transactions.map((tx) => ( ))}
CP Tx ID idTag Connector Meter Start (Wh) Meter Stop (Wh) kWh Used Start Time Stop Time
{tx.cpId} {tx.id} {tx.idTag} {tx.connectorId} {tx.meterStart || "-"} {tx.meterStop || "-"} {tx.meterStart !== null && tx.meterStop !== null ? ((tx.meterStop - tx.meterStart) / 1000).toFixed(2) : "-"} {tx.startTs || "-"} {tx.stopTs || "-"}
); }; export default Dashboard;
